name: KeyKey
description:
The escape key of your keyboard is angry with you. You've been mistreating the keys on your keyboard all this time.  KEY EXPLOITER!!!

For this reason you can only use one key for playing this game.

You must try to type as many letters as possible with your chosen key avoiding getting hurt. Hold the key to charge your wave bomb and delete some of the letters, but try not to press the key for too long or it will explode. Keep writting to get more wave bombs.

Try playing with keys of all kinds between games and find out what Escape has to say.

NOTE: This is my first Game Jam so don't hesitate to give me feedback to keep on improving :)
